thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Asia Stocks Take a Roller-Coaster Ride

author: Gregor Stuart Hunter
title: Asia Stocks Take a Roller-Coaster Ride
text:
The Dow Jones Industrial Average shed up to 680 points Thursday as government bond yields touched multiyear highs, and investors continued to grapple with a recent pickup in volatility.
More recently, the Dow was down 568 points, or 2.3%, to 24325, deepening its losses for the week. The S&P 500 slid 1.9%, while the Nasdaq Composite dropped 2.1%.
